EmailTemplate.description: Generic email to FO and PO
EmailTemplate.name: Award Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: An Award request for {!Award__c.ProgramName__c} for {!Award__c.LEAName} has been submitted for approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User, This email is to notify you that an award request for {!Award__c.ProgramName__c} for {!Award__c.LEAName__c} has been submitted for your approval. Please click the link below to review and approve it.
Click here
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
